snippet.title: Spyragon: Colossal Combos
snippet.description:
Spyragon is available to play on the iOS App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/spyragon/id1584715775

With Spyragon Classic, Combos give the player the ability to match based on multiple colors.  However, they are not the easiest of pieces to create, because they require multiple matches that are strategically placed in the correct spots.  See some impressive boards that create 4 and even 5 Combos at once!

Directions available at: https://spyraverse.com

Also follow us on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @spyraverse

#Spyragon #Spyraverse #gaming #mobilegames #mobilegaming #iosgames #ios #hypercasual #newgames
